text: Amphitorna brunhyala is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Shen and Chen in 1990. It is found in China (Guangdong, 2011: Notes on the genus Spectroreta Warren (Lepidoptera: Drepanidae) from China with description of a new species. Tinea 21(5): 251-253. and Fujian)., 2012: Revision of Chinese Oretinae (Lepidoptera, Drepanidae). Zootaxa 3445: 1-36. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1990 Category:Drepaninae Category:Moths of China
title: Amphitorna brunhyala
